attributes.action: A change of leadership in the elected goverment cannot take place without a general election being called
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister was voted into office and any leadership change should be put to the country in the form of a general election, so the peoples choice of leader is placed in charge of the country

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
